title: Fragments, 1962-56-45-a/f, 16th–17th century
provenance: from the Richard Cranch Greenleaf Collection.
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Panel of green silk velvet on yellow ground [in seven pieces], cut and uncut; pattern of floral spray.  Trimmed with tassel fringe.
